W01_LTXT_MIDO_MIYAKOUNIV_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_MIDO_MIYAKOUNIV_000_DETAIL.text: The school attended by Tsunanori Mido. It's considered one of the top universities in the nation, and has produced many international award recipients.

W01_LTXT_MIDO_RAKUGAKU_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_MIDO_RAKUGAKU_000_DETAIL.text: A combined junior and senior high school for well-to-do young women. Tsunanori Mido's little sister attends here.

W01_LTXT_MIDO_HOUSEOFMIDO_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_LTXT_MIDO_HOUSEOFMIDO_000_DETAIL.text: Tsunanori Mido's home. Its main building, exquisite in design and built before the war, is famous in its own right. It's also home to a big cute doggo.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_GOKAKUDO_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_GOKAKUDO_000_DETAIL.text: The center of the barrier enveloping Miyako City. Use the power of the spirits to fortify the barrier and your job will be done.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_GOKAKUDO_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_GOKAKUDO_100_DETAIL.text: The center of the barrier enveloping Miyako City. Use the power of the spirits to fortify the barrier and your job will be done.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_GOKAKUDO_BATTLE_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_GOKAKUDO_BATTLE_000_TITLE.text: He Who Waits at Gokakudo Temple

W01_EVAR_MIDO_GOKAKUDO_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_GOKAKUDO_BATTLE_000_DETAIL.text: The problems at all the barriers have been sorted. Time to wrap things up at Gokakudo Temple.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_GOKAKUDO_BATTLE_220_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_GOKAKUDO_BATTLE_220_DETAIL.text: Destroy the barrier and unleash Miyako City in the direction of the Conjoined Worlds.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_GOKAKUDO_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_GOKAKUDO_200_DETAIL.text: Something is going on with the barrier. It's centered around Gokakudo Temple, so you should head over there and check it out.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_SEQUOIAMALL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_SEQUOIAMALL_000_DETAIL.text: The eastern barrier is likely in this shopping mall.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_SEQUOIAMALL_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_SEQUOIAMALL_010_DETAIL.text: The talisman must be repaired if the eastern barrier is to be mended.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_SANGENIN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_SANGENIN_000_DETAIL.text: The northern barrier is likely located in Sangen-in Temple, which is among Miyako City's most notable tourist destinations.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_ZIZOUPARK_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_ZIZOUPARK_000_DETAIL.text: The western barrier is likely located in this children's park.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_ZIZOUPARK_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_ZIZOUPARK_001_DETAIL.text: There's something suspicious about the Jizo at the children's park, but you can't figure out what.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_ZIZOUPARK_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_ZIZOUPARK_010_DETAIL.text: The Jizo must be repaired if the western barrier is to be mended.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_RAKUSUITOWER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_RAKUSUITOWER_000_DETAIL.text: The southern barrier is likely located in Miyako City's most famous landmark, Rakusuiro Tower.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_SEQUOIAMALL_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_SEQUOIAMALL_200_DETAIL.text: The eastern barrier is likely located in this shopping mall.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_SANGENIN_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_SANGENIN_200_DETAIL.text: The northern barrier is likely located in Sangen-in Temple, which is among Miyako City's most notable tourist destinations.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_ZIZOUPARK_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_ZIZOUPARK_200_DETAIL.text: The western barrier is likely located in this children's park.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_RAKUSUITOWER_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_RAKUSUITOWER_200_DETAIL.text: The southern barrier is likely located in Miyako City's most famous landmark, Rakusuiro Tower.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_CATHEDRAL_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_CATHEDRAL_200_DETAIL.text: The mysterious man intends to escape to the Junction via the shrine. Give pursuit and find out what he's planning.

W01_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: The Cathedral Project is an initiative created to investigate the Heavens—but why were you chosen for it?

W01_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_100_DETAIL.text: The Cathedral Project is an initiative created to investigate the Heavens. It's only natural that you, a proud member of the Mido family, would be chosen for it.

W01_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_200_DETAIL.text: The Cathedral Project is an initiative created to investigate the Heavens. You can't help but feel like there's something sketchy about the whole endeavor.

W01_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_300_DETAIL.text: The Cathedral Project is an initiative created to investigate the Heavens. Do what you must as a member of the Mido family.

W01_WRLD_MIDO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_WRLD_MIDO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: After a long journey, you've finally made it back to Miyako City. However, it seems like hardly any time has passed over here.

W01_WRLD_MIDO_RETURN_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_WRLD_MIDO_RETURN_100_DETAIL.text: After a long journey, you've finally made it back to Miyako City. Your handler tried to stop you, but you managed to give her the slip.

W01_WRLD_MIDO_RETURN_200_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_WRLD_MIDO_RETURN_200_DETAIL.text: After a long journey, you've finally made it back to Miyako City. Unfortunately, something seems off...

W01_WRLD_MIDO_RETURN_210_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_WRLD_MIDO_RETURN_210_DETAIL.text: After fighting the mysterious man, you've reaffirmed what you must do as a member of the Mido family.

W01_WRLD_MIDO_RETURN_220_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_WRLD_MIDO_RETURN_220_DETAIL.text: The man from the Heavens revealed the truth, and now you've returned to Miyako City to settle things for good.

W01_WRLD_MIDO_RETURN_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_WRLD_MIDO_RETURN_300_DETAIL.text: After a long journey, you've finally made it back to Miyako City. But upon your return, you find the shrine destroyed and a mysterious man lurking about.

W01_WRLD_MIDO_RETURN_400_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_WRLD_MIDO_RETURN_400_DETAIL.text: After a long journey, you've finally made it back to Miyako City.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_RAKUGAKU_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_RAKUGAKU_300_DETAIL.text: The mysterious man's words have piqued your curiosity. Go to Rakugaku Academy and speak with Tomoko.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_HOME_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_HOME_300_DETAIL.text: The mysterious man's words have piqued your curiosity. Return home and talk to your parents.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_OOIKE_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_OOIKE_300_DETAIL.text: Tomoko's been abducted. You must save her!

W01_EVAR_MIDO_HOME_310_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_HOME_310_DETAIL.text: Was Tomoko's startling confession true? Go home and confront your parents.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_STATION_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_STATION_300_DETAIL.text: Your dad is at the station. What does he have to say?

W01_EVAR_MIDO_MALL_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_MALL_300_DETAIL.text: Your father bid you farewell like it was nothing. How is that possible? Surely your mother will have something to say.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_RAKUGAKU_310_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_RAKUGAKU_310_DETAIL.text: Tomoko must have something to say—you're siblings, after all.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_SEIDO_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_SEIDO_300_DETAIL.text: So this is what the mysterious man was talking about! You should meet with him again now that you know the truth.

W01_EVAR_MIDO_GOKAKUDO_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W01_EVAR_MIDO_GOKAKUDO_300_DETAIL.text: The kugutsu puppets all acknowledge you as Tsunanori Mido. Perhaps something will change if you use the power of the spirits you've gathered to mend the barrier.
